About Me

A short introduction to me!

Biography

I'm a Data Science student at Minerva Schools at KGI, interested in data journalism and visualisation, as well as applying data science to the digital humanities! Born and raised in Hong Kong, I am currently based in Singapore.

Founding Editor of Babel

Senegal | Jan - Apr 2017

I founded Babel, the multi-lingual educational newspaper of Joal-Fadiouth. Interviewed and translated contributions from residents of Joal-Fadiouth into French, Spanish, English and Wolof.

Journalist at The Straits Times

Singapore | Jun - Sep 2017

As a member of the The Straits Times Editorial Project Unit, I managed The Straits Times contributions to Asia News Network and collaborated with journalists from other Southeast Asian countries for ASEAN 50th anniversary editorial projects.

Development Intern at Global Citizen Year

Oakland | Jun 2017 - Feb 2018

I streamlined Global Citizen Year philanthropic pipeline by operating Salesforce systems and carried out prospect research and qualification, and donor stewardship efforts.
